import react,{useState,useEffect} from 'react'; import {NavLink} from 'react-router-dom' import axios from 'axios' import Loader from './loader' import Button from '@material-ui/core/Button'; import Tooltip from '@material-ui/core/Tooltip'; import { FcSearch } from "react-icons/fc"; import { Modal } from 'react-bootstrap'; import "../css/user.css" const MyData = ()=>{ const [username,setUsername] = useState("") const [userSeacrchedData,setUserSearchedData] = useState({}) const [loader,setLoader] = useState(false) const [errorCode,setErrorCode] = useState("200") const [clicked,setClicked] = useState(0) const [reposArray,setresposArray] = useState([]) const [languagesArray,setlanguagesArray] = useState([]) const [modal,setModal] = useState(false) const [modal2,setModal2] = useState(false) useEffect(()=>{ setUsername("zadfab") getData() return( console.clear() ) },[]) useEffect(()=>{ getData() },[clicked]) const getData = async()=>{ setErrorCode("200") const userData = await axios( { method: 'GET', url:`https://api.github.com/users/${username}`, } ).then(async(response)=>{ setUserSearchedData(response.data) const repos_info = await axios({ method: 'GET', url:`https://api.github.com/users/${username}/repos` }).then((response)=>{ setresposArray(response.data) }).catch((error)=>{ console.log(error) }) setLoader(true) }).catch((error)=>{ setLoader(false) try{ console.log(error.response.status) setErrorCode(error.response.status) setLoader(false) } catch{ setErrorCode("404") setLoader(false) } }) } const getLanguages = async(link) =>{ await axios({ method: "GET", url:link }).then((response) =>{ console.log(response) setlanguagesArray(response.data) }).catch((error) =>{ setlanguagesArray([]) }) } return ( <>

Search your user name

{return(setUsername(e.target.value))}}/>

{userSeacrchedData.bio}

Follower

{userSeacrchedData.followers}

Following

{userSeacrchedData.following}

Public Reposetries

{userSeacrchedData.public_repos}

Type

{userSeacrchedData.type}

{/* Modal */} {setModal(false)}}> {userSeacrchedData.login} Reposetries {reposArray.map((item,index)=>{ return( <> {/*

Link to repo */} ) })}
Sr.no. Repo name Language Used Date Created Last Pushed Size Link All Languages used in project

:} ) } export default MyData
